product_name: Riverside Heavy Duty Utility Straps Twin Pack - 15 ft.
long_description: The 15 ft. Riverside Heavy Duty utility straps are a great choice for tying down gear on top of your car. 1 in. heavy-duty webbing features extra-strength stitching. Galvanized buckle features a buckle protector to prevent scratches; buckle protector can be slid on or off. Center-spring mounted cams offer a strong, secure grip. Includes two 15 ft. straps.
short_description: The 15 ft. Riverside Heavy Duty utility straps are a great choice for tying down gear on top of your car.
